name: Stack The Odds
description:
Stack The Odds Started out as a Puzzle Platformer, now it's a Comedic Platformer.

You have to steal the Odds. Odds are these odd looking creatures. stack them on top of each other. because why not. Beat the levels maybe get a few laughs on the way. Have fun.

This game was made as a submission for Random Theme Generator Jam with the theme "Steal Insurmountable Odds Together".

If you find any bugs or have any kind of feedback either post it in the comments or tweet me @MohammedShwarib. all feedback is welcome.
